column4: He recently broke the scoring record making him the GOAT.
He is the best shooter of all time
He is a star player on the Mavs.
Jalen Hurts is the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. He will be playing in the upcoming Superbowl 57.
Patrick Mahomes is the starting quarterback for the Kansas City Chiefs. He will be playing in the upcoming Superbowl 57.
Justin Jefferson a starting wide reciever for the Minnesota Vikings. He is a young talent.
